alert.note: Alert for Copiah; Rankin; Simpson (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 10 at 12:03PM CDT until June 10 at 1:00PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Rankin County in central Mississippi... Simpson County in central Mississippi... Copiah County in central Mississippi... * Until 100 PM CDT. * At 1202 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Florence to near Glancy, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Richland, Star, Florence and Monterey around 1210 PM CDT. Brandon around 1215 PM CDT. Cato around 1225 PM CDT. Rockport and Johns around 1230 PM CDT. Union and Pelahatchie around 1235 PM CDT. Pinola and Shivers around 1245 PM CDT. Magee and Sanatorium around 100 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include D`Lo, Beauregard, Braxton, Puckett and Georgetown. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
